oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lebanese actors
Drama -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Red Prince. A play. Starring Antoine Kerbage. Actors: Elie Sneifer, Leila Karam, Elias Rizk. Written by Maroun Abboud. Directed by Yakoub Chedrawi. 12 December 1972, Cinema and theater Orly.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Red Prince
